title: DFT and comparative adsorption study of NiO, MnO, and Mn2NiO4 nanomaterials for the removal of amaranth dye from synthetic water
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,28285-28297
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04208E, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Madiha Ahmad, Qamar Riaz, Mehwish Tabassum, Syed Salman Shafqat, Aima tul Ayesha, Muhammad Zubair, Youpeng Xiong, Asad Syed, Hind A. AL-Shwaiman, Muhammad Arif Nadeem, Xin Jia, Guobao Xu, Muhammad Nadeem Zafar
NiO nanoparticles, MnO nanoparticles, and Mn2NiO4 nanocomposites were synthesized using a facile hydrothermal method, and their performance in the removal of amaranth dye from synthetic wastewater was compared.
